headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Lululemon After Shares Drop Over 50% in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with lululemon athletica stock? You are definitely not alone. After a rollercoaster year in the markets, plenty of investors are scratching their heads and wondering whether this retail powerhouse has more room to fall or is about to pull off a surprising comeback. In just the past week, lululemon shares have bounced up by 6.1%, hinting at some renewed optimism or, at the very least, a bargain-hunting crowd stepping in. But if you zoom out, the story looks less rosy...

headline: Jim Cramer Says He Stopped Liking lululemon When They Sued Costco
summary: lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently shared his thoughts on. A caller inquired if the stock, down 57%, might be worth considering at current levels. Cramer remarked: “I tell you, I stopped liking them when I saw that they sued Costco for a really good product that Costco had. […]
